name: HORDE ATTACK
description: Horde attack is a demolition derby in middle ages! Send swarms of riders from city to city to conquer the huge world in this fast-paced multiplayer strategy game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/10 Processor: 1 GHz or higher Memory: 512 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/10 Processor: 2 GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB, OpenGL Storage: 500 MB available space
